To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AccelerationBands _abands;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_abands = ABANDS(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_abands.IsReady)
{
    var middleBand = _abands.MiddleBand.Value;
    var upperBand = _abands.UpperBand.Value;
    var lowerBand = _abands.LowerBand.Value;
    var current = _abands.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.abands = self.ABANDS(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.abands.IsReady:
    middle_band = self.abands.MiddleBand.Value
    upper_band = self.abands.UpperBand.Value
    lower_band = self.abands.LowerBand.Value
    current = self.abands.Current.Value
